tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive warehouse information including capacity, utilization, and operational status for inventory management purposes.

include_capacity_details.description: Include detailed capacity and utilization metrics

include_operational_status.description: Include current operational status and schedules

data_date.description: Specific date for historical data (ISO 8601 format)

error_messages: Warehouse not found: The specified warehouse ID does not exist.
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format for data_date parameter.
Historical data unavailable: Data for the specified date is not available.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to access warehouse data.
usage: Provide warehouse_id to get warehouse details. Use include_capacity_details and include_operational_status flags to control data scope. Specify data_date for historical snapshots.
